page.title: 04Two Farms (2)Norton Grange
page.content: In common with most farmers in the area Mr.F.Palmer of Norton Grange Farm rents his land from the Welbeck Estate Co.which also owns most of the dwellings in and around the villages of Norton and Cuckney.While many of the surrounding farms are solely arable, Norton Grange has beef cattle as well as goats and poultry. Like many other local farmers' wives Mrs.Palmer welcomes Bed and Breakfast guests.These are usually tourists who use the Cuckney area as a stop-over point in their travels around the wider area.Popular tourist spots are {Creswell Crags},{The Peak District {National Park},{Sherwood Forest},{ {Chatsworth House}and the other stately homes in the area nearby known as {The {Dukeries.}
